public interface PutnamCalculationServiceRemote

PutnamCalculationServiceRemote Interface for calculations within the Putnam model

Author:
Andre Munzinger, David Dornseifer

Method Detail

calc

PutnamResult calc(float sloc,
                  float pp,
                  COCOMOResult cocomoResults)
                  throws PutnamCalcException,
                         EntityNotFoundException,
                         DatabaseConnectionException
calc Mainprocess of Putnamcalcprocess This method calls all other functions who calculate the estimates

Returns:
Endresult of the Putnam-Calculation
Throws:
PutnamCalcException - Thrown if - Sourcelines of code are zero or less - PP is zero or less - COCOMOResult is null
DatabaseConnectionException - If there was a problem in the DB
EntityNotFoundException - If there was anexception in the calculationFacade

Parameters:

Returns:
the parameter e
Throws:
PutnamCalcException - Thrown if - Sourcelines of code are zero or less - Exception in the calculationFacade
